attributes.action: scrap the idea about a Smoking Licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is another way for a selection of people to be forced to adhere to unfair Draconian legislation dreamt up by health Nazis. There is enough tax on tobacco as it is without smokers having to pay extra and go through the hassle of aquiring one of these licences. It is ridiculous that our lives are being interfered with as it is. We have been told about the dangers, accepted them, now it is time to leave people alone to make up their own minds. What is the overall point of this anyway??

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/smokingpermit/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
